item.title: 外观数列
item.author: vllbc
item.description: 外观数列 https://leetcode-cn.com/problems/count-and-say/ 这题有意思 可以打表，不过打表的过程也相当于做出来了 class Solution: def countAndSay(self,n: int) -> str: if n == 1: return '1' s = self.countAndSay(n - 1) n,res = 0,'' for ii,ss in enumerate(s): if ss != s[n]: res += str(ii-n) + s[n] n = ii res += str(len(s)
